name: sellerexpress
overview:
SellerExpress is a complete package for managing every step of the marketplace sales cycle. It helps automates your processes to save you time and money leaving you free to pay attention to growing your business.

Sign up for your free 15 day trial and see how SellerExpress can synchronise your inventory across eBay, PlayTrade and Amazon UK, Germany, France, USA, Canada and Japan, as well as integration with your own website. Reduce overselling and refunds whilst improving your seller rating using our innovative ‘inventory splitter’ to manage how much you list and sell on each marketplace. Turbo-charge your order processing with customised picking lists and invoices to improve customer satisfaction. Achieve maximum sales at the best possible margin with an automatic repricing tool that works to your rules. Customise your sales reporting and let SellerExpress provide you with an accurate picture of your sales performance to help you increase your sales and profit across all your marketplaces. For further information, or if you have any questions, contact us here http://www.sellerexpress.com/contact/

To sign up for your free 15 day trial, follow the link below https://login.sellerexpress.com/signup
